alert.note: Alert for Schuyler; Steuben; Yates (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 1:20AM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of west central Schuyler, Yates and Steuben Counties through 215 AM EDT... At 117 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a line of strong thunderstorms across Livingston and Allegany Counties. Movement was northeast at 45 mph. If they hold together, these storms will enter western Yates and Steuben Counties between 130 AM and 2 AM. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Hornell, Bath, Penn Yan, Campbell, Benton, Urbana, Canisteo, Potter, Wayland and Addison. This includes the following highway exits... Interstate 86/Route 17 between 34 and 42. Interstate 390 between 1 and 3. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
